mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVOR(FAVOR_NO, POST_NO, USER_ID, POST_FAVOR) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{postNo}, #{userId}, '추천' )
mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_NO,POSTER_NAME, F.FAVOR_NO FROM POSTER P, (SELECT POST_NO, FAVOR_NO FROM FAVOR WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}) F WHERE P.POST_NO = F.POST_NO(+) ORDER BY POST_NO ASC
